articles.title: Frontend design, react, and a bridge over the great divide
articles.shortDescription: Frontend designers create the HTML, CSS, and presentational JavaScript code that powers web products’ user interfaces. I see frontend design as helpful mortar that bridges the gap between design and development.

articles.title: Frontend vs Backend
articles.shortDescription: Frontend is about perception. When we build Frontend things, we care a lot about how users perceive what we built. We spend an ungodly amount of time asking these questions (so much that countless jobs were created for each of them).

articles.title: Using Prettier with Airbnb's ESLint config
articles.shortDescription: What is Prettier and Airbnb’s ESlint configuration. Airbnb ESLint configuration is one of the most used ESLint configuration and Prettier is an opinionated code formatter with a handful options.
